DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether Nivolumab effective treatment DLBCL patient fail ineligible ASCT
DOC.brief_title: Study Nivolumab Patients With Relapsed Refractory Diffuse Large B-Cell Lymphoma ( DLBCL ) That Have Either Failed Are Not Eligible Autologous Stem Cell Transplant ( CheckMate 139 )
DOC.criteria: For information regard BMS clinical trial participation , please visit www.BMSStudyConnect.com Confirmation relapse refractory DLBCL transform lymphoma ( TL ) Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group ( ECOG ) performance status 0 1 At least one lesion measure > 1.5 cm Prior therapy screen lab criterion must meet Appropriate contraceptive measure must take Known central nervous system ( CNS ) lymphoma History interstitial lung disease , prior malignancy , active autoimmune disease , positive test hepatitis B hepatitis C virus Prior allogeneic stem cell transplant ( SCT ) , chest radiation ≤ 24 week study drug , ≥1000 mg Carmustine Bischloroethylnitrosourea ( BCNU ) part pretransplant conditioning regimen , prior treatment drug target Tcell costimulation immune checkpoint pathway Women breastfeed pregnant
